item.description:
This group is for children from birth to school age. We sing songs, do finger plays, read books, do art and craft projects and more!

Russian Play Group is free and open for public.We meet weekly on Mondays 10-12am Sep 12 trough Oct 10 2011.

Walk-ins are welcome, but space is limited. So, signing up in advance will help you to reserve your spot. Please specify how many people are coming.

Please contact me at ForRussianKids@gmail.com for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the new meeting room on the lower level

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Play Group
